description: New generation of Aspose.Slides Cloud SDK for .NET that allows to create, edit or convert PowerPoint documents with Aspose.Slides Cloud REST API using.
releaseNotes:
This release contains the following Aspose.Slides for Cloud 18.7 REST API new features:
- added password parameter to DeleteNotesSlideParagraphRequest, DeleteNotesSlideParagraphsRequest, DeleteNotesSlidePortionRequest, DeleteNotesSlidePortionsRequest, DeleteNotesSlideRequest, DeleteNotesSlideShapeRequest, DeleteNotesSlideShapesRequest, DeleteParagraphRequest, DeleteParagraphsRequest, DeletePortionRequest, DeletePortionsRequest, DeleteSlideByIndexRequest, DeleteSlideShapeRequest, DeleteSlideShapesRequest, DeleteSlidesCleanSlidesListRequest, DeleteSlidesDocumentPropertiesRequest, DeleteSlidesDocumentPropertyRequest, DeleteSlidesSlideBackgroundRequest, GetLayoutSlideRequest, GetLayoutSlidesListRequest, GetMasterSlideRequest, GetMasterSlidesListRequest, GetNotesSlideRequest, GetNotesSlideShapeParagraphRequest, GetNotesSlideShapeParagraphsRequest, GetNotesSlideShapePortionRequest, GetNotesSlideShapePortionsRequest, GetNotesSlideShapeRequest, GetNotesSlideShapeWithFormatRequest, GetNotesSlideShapesRequest, GetNotesSlideWithFormatRequest, GetParagraphPortionRequest, GetParagraphPortionsRequest, GetShapeParagraphRequest, GetShapeWithFormatRequest, GetSlideShapeParagraphsRequest, GetSlideShapeRequest, GetSlideShapesRequest, GetSlideWithFormatRequest, GetSlidesDocumentPropertiesRequest, GetSlidesDocumentPropertyRequest, GetSlidesImageWithFormatRequest, GetSlidesImagesRequest, GetSlidesPlaceholderRequest, GetSlidesPlaceholdersRequest, GetSlidesPresentationTextItemsRequest, GetSlidesSlideBackgroundRequest, GetSlidesSlideCommentsRequest, GetSlidesSlideImagesRequest, GetSlidesSlideRequest, GetSlidesSlideTextItemsRequest, GetSlidesSlidesListRequest, GetSlidesThemeColorSchemeRequest, GetSlidesThemeFontSchemeRequest, GetSlidesThemeFormatSchemeRequest, GetSlidesThemeRequest, PostAddNewParagraphRequest, PostAddNewPortionRequest, PostAddNewShapeRequest, PostAddNotesSlideRequest, PostCopyLayoutSlideFromSourcePresentationRequest, PostCopyMasterSlideFromSourcePresentationRequest, PostNotesSlideAddNewParagraphRequest, PostNotesSlideAddNewPortionRequest, PostNotesSlideAddNewShapeRequest, PostNotesSlideShapeSaveAsRequest, PostPresentationMergeRequest, PostShapeSaveAsRequest, PostSlideSaveAsRequest, PostSlidesPresentationReplaceTextRequest, PostSlidesReorderPositionRequest, PostSlidesSetDocumentPropertiesRequest, PostSlidesSlideReplaceTextRequest, PostSlidesSplitRequest, PutLayoutSlideRequest, PutPresentationMergeRequest, PutSetParagraphPortionPropertiesRequest, PutSetParagraphPropertiesRequest, PutSlideShapeInfoRequest, PutSlidesSetDocumentPropertyRequest, PutSlidesSlideBackgroundRequest, PutSlidesSlideRequest, PutUpdateNotesSlideRequest, PutUpdateNotesSlideShapeParagraphRequest, PutUpdateNotesSlideShapePortionRequest and PutUpdateNotesSlideShapeRequest objects; cloneFromPassword parameter to PostCopyMasterSlideFromSourcePresentationRequest and PostCopyLayoutSlideFromSourcePresentationRequest objects; templatePassword parameter to PutNewPresentationRequest object to allow loading & manipulating encrypted documents.
- Removed PdfNotes & SwfNotes from ExportFormat enumeration.
title: Aspose.Slides Cloud SDK for .NET
